channel.title: house for today and for tomorrow
channel.description: house for today and for tomorrow

item.title: Explore the kit house
item.description:
Explore the kit house

Based on the principles of modern architecture and a simplicity of a kit, the ecokit home was created with many smart features to easily adapt various uses: it can be a permanent home, holiday house, office, garden studio or rural retreat.

item.title: Powered by imagination.Inspired by innovation.
item.description:
Powered by imagination.Inspired by innovation.

Ecokit is affordable, versatile, easy to assemble, zero energy kit home, with minimal operating costs and positive environmental impact.
